description: Grants the user the power to create vibrations and quakes, enabling them to generate massive shockwaves through ground, seafloor, and air with devastating destructive capacity.

users.circumstances: Whitebeard has possessed this fruit for at least 42 years

abilityReveals.description: User can create massive tsunamis by generating seismic shockwaves in the ocean, threatening to drown entire islands.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Whitebeard creates two massive tsunamis on either side of Marineford, forcing Admiral Aokiji to intervene.

abilityReveals.description: User can punch the air itself, creating visible cracks in the atmosphere that generate devastating shockwaves.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Whitebeard punches the air, creating cracks that ripple through the Marine ranks with seismic force.

weaknesses.weakness: Indiscriminate damage affects allies and enemies alike

strengths.strength: Considered the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit with the power to destroy the world
strengths.description: The fruit grants world-ending destructive capabilities through earthquake and tsunami generation.

description: Grants the user the ability to create, control, and transform into ice at will.

users.circumstances: Aokiji's devil fruit as a Marine Admiral

abilityReveals.description: User can instantly freeze massive bodies of water, including ocean-sized tsunamis and entire bays.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Aokiji freezes both of Whitebeard's tsunamis and later freezes the entire bay around Marineford, creating a frozen battlefield.

strengths.strength: Can instantly freeze massive environmental threats and reshape battlefields
strengths.description: The ice powers allow for large-scale environmental manipulation and battlefield control.

description: An unnamed Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a dalmatian or dalmatian-human hybrid.

users.circumstances: Vice Admiral Dalmatian always keeps his powers active, remaining in hybrid form

abilityReveals.description: User transforms into a muscular, bipedal dalmatian-human hybrid with white fur and black spots.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Dalmatian is shown in his hybrid form among the Vice Admirals at Marineford.

strengths.strength: Enhanced physical abilities in hybrid form
strengths.description: The dalmatian transformation provides increased strength and combat capabilities.
